item.title: Avatars under the minimum size limit
item.description: Uploading avatars under the minimum size limit There are a couple of reasons why you might want to upload an avatar under the minimum size: maybe it’s a false positive, maybe you just want that extra less centimeters or maybe you’re just curious. In any case, this post will guide you on how to remove the limit and how to fix yourself in case your avatar won’t allow you to switch back to your normal avatar (or open the quick menu completely).
